Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: Kujari and Wallacia declares independence; Capellan offensive continues. [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Kujari],Kujari]] and [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Wallacia],Wallacia]] have recently declared independence from Free Worlds League. Naturally, given the two systems’ strategic positions on Andurien’s border, Thomas Marik ordered immediate reaction. FWLM Second Oriente Hussars have completed their occupation of Wallacia and are about to move on Kujari. Capellans have confirmed their last month’s success in retaking [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Primus],Primus]] and [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Prix],Prix]] planets. Recently Andurians also gave up their long fight for [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Gunthar],Gunthar]] departing the system on 9 July and have finally admitted to have failed in their attack on [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Turin],Turin]] back in April.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
With offensive capabilities of Duchy of Andurien greatly diminished after recent months reverses, political analysts speculate that Thomas Marik may take this opportunity to take a more aggressive steps against former FWL province. Otherwise he may very well risk that Duchy is being taken over by Capellan Confederation



This has been the CNB July broadcast.
